title: Circana’s 2026 Food & Beverage Outlook Reveals Growth Driven by Price and Product Mix as Consumers Optimize Spending
description:
Chicago, Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Circana, LLC,
 today released its revised 2026 outlook for the U.S. food and beverage (F&B) retail sector. The update points toward continued volume tightness amid ongoing demand challenges. Meanwhile, price expecta…
